description_for_model: T1000 is a new AI assistant for tax professionals, designed to help them navigate complex and changing regulations and legal precedents. T1000 can answer questions, provide guidance, and generate reports based on thousands of pages of relevant documents.
description_for_human: T1000 is a new AI assistant for tax professionals, designed to help them navigate complex and changing regulations and legal precedents. T1000 can answer questions, provide guidance, and generate reports based on thousands of pages of relevant documents.
